meanings.definition: Retailors (verb): to sell goods to the public
meanings.sent1: The local shop retailors various items to customers every day.
meanings.sent2: She retailors handmade jewelry at the market on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to retailors its toys to the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to retailors its warmth to the chilly morning air.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful vendor retailors fresh fruits with a smile.

meanings.definition: Retailors (noun): individuals or businesses that sell goods to the public
meanings.sent1: The retailors in the mall offer a wide range of products.
meanings.sent2: Local retailors play a vital role in the community's economy.
meanings.sent3: The group of retailors decided to have a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: The retailors stood out like colorful flowers in the market.
meanings.sent5: The retailors' market stall was always bustling with activity.
